TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCustomPlace>
Public Class FileDialogCustomPlacesCollection Inherits Collection(Of FileDialogCustomPlace)

summary.span: Representa uma coleção de locais personalizados do Windows Vista para a classe .

span.span: Represents a collection of Windows Vista custom places for the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Na [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], essa classe não tem nenhum efeito.On [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)], this class does not have any effect. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o .The following code example demonstrates how to use the . Para executar este exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário do Windows e chamar `InitializeDialogAndButton` do construtor do formulário ou método manipulador de eventos.To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Add(valuetype System.Guid knownFolderGuid) cil managed

param.name: knownFolderGuid
param.span: Um que representa uma Pasta Conhecida [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)].

span.span: A that represents a [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folder.

summary.span: Adiciona um local personalizado para a coleção .

span.span: Adds a custom place to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A pasta é adicionada para locais personalizados somente para um determinado e não é uma grande alteração sistema ou aplicativo.The folder is added to custom places only for a particular and is not a system or application wide change. As pastas são posicionadas nos locais personalizados na ordem em que eles são adicionados à .The folders are positioned in the custom places in the order that they are added to the . O último adicionado será na parte superior.The last one added will be at the top. Se você adicionar um local personalizado à coleção que não existe no computador que executa o aplicativo, o local personalizado não será mostrado.If you add a custom place to the collection that does not exist on the computer running the application, the custom place will not be shown. GUIDs diferenciam maiusculas de minúsculas.GUIDs are case-insensitive. Para obter uma lista das [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] pastas conhecidas, consulte [GUIDs de pasta conhecidas para locais do arquivo de caixa de diálogo personalizada](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) ou arquivo Knownfolders h no [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)].For a list of the available [!INCLUDE[wiprlhext](~/includes/wiprlhext-md.md)] Known Folders, see [Known Folder GUIDs for File Dialog Custom Places](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/known-folder-guids-for-file-dialog-custom-places.md) or the KnownFolders.h file in the [!INCLUDE[winSDK](~/includes/winsdk-md.md)]. ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o método.The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. Para executar este exemplo, cole o código a seguir em um formulário do Windows e chamar `InitializeDialogAndButton` do construtor do formulário ou método manipulador de eventos.To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form and call `InitializeDialogAndButton` from the form's constructor or event-handling method. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialogCommonPlaces/VB/Form1.vb#1)]
